channel.title: PC turns off in specific scene
channel.description:
The scene in questionable ethics after you leave the scientists to go outside on your own is where my PC is crashing every single time I try to play it. After around 30 seconds of loading up the scene, my computer just turns itself off. I'd get some screenshots, but I don't want to turn my computer off again. This has happened over 3 times now consistently.
There's nothing for black mesa in my Steam/dumps/ folder.

item.title: PC turns off in specific scene
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
Like Morloc said, check the Windows Event Log (can be found by searching in the Start menu) and see if any fatal errors happened at the times of the crashes.
Windows event logs are created and saved instantaneously, so there will most likely be something there.
Also, try updating any out-of-date video drivers and such, it never hurts to check that sort of thing.
